ValidationRule.description: validate that if there a mark up value they select the type of mark up, for now is just for APAC Countries.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Account', NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND( OR(( ISPICKVAL(Mark_up__c, 'No mark-up')), ( ISPICKVAL(Mark_up__c, ''))), NOT( ISBLANK(Mark_up_Value__c))) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select the Mark up type if Markup Value is filled
